eykthyr.embedding.Embedding#

class eykthyr.embedding.Embedding(embedding: numpy.ndarray = None, embedding_knn: scipy.sparse._matrix.spmatrix = None, sampling_ixs: numpy.ndarray = None, corrcoef: numpy.ndarray = None, corrcoef_random: numpy.ndarray = None, transition_prob: numpy.ndarray = None, transition_prob_random: numpy.ndarray = None, delta_embedding: numpy.ndarray = None, delta_embedding_random: numpy.ndarray = None, total_p_mass: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_embedding: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_grid: numpy.ndarray = None, flow: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_norm: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_norm_magnitude: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_rndm: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_norm_rndm: numpy.ndarray = None, flow_norm_magnitude_rndm: numpy.ndarray = None, min_mass: float = None, mass_filter: numpy.ndarray = None, colorandum: numpy.ndarray = None)[source]#
